stance_1: Chicken and pork are less expensive
stance_2: I am trying to cut down on red meat
justification: The cost of chicken and pork being lower supports the reduction of red meat, as these alternatives are more financially appealing.

stance_1: Chicken and pork are less expensive
stance_2: I eat chicken, beef, and pork regularly
justification: Regular consumption of chicken and pork is supported by their lower cost, making them more accessible.

stance_1: Chicken and pork are less expensive

justification: Finding chicken and pork less expensive could make it less likely to shift fully to plant-based options, creating a mild conflict.
